cmwell_log.title: CM-Well Log
cmwell_log.description: The default log format for the core CM-Well processes.
cmwell_log.opid-field: NOT USED. This can be used in the future for correlation field of the same logical operation

threadGroup.description: The group of the thread and the logging thread - IT'S DISABLED DUE TO A BUG/FEATURE WITH LNAV THAT IGNORES GROUPS

loggingThread.description: The thread id of the logging system (the async logging thread)

module.description: The name of the module that generated the message

actorSystem.description: The actor system in which the logging was performed

akkaSource.description: The actorâ€™s address when instantiating a logger within it
